channel.title: [317] Run.bat
channel.description:
I recently added d claws to my server and now when i run it it says this:
online Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)
I compiled it and it said no errors.
Any Idea Why?
---------------------------------------FIXED----------------------------------------
Solution:
Make sure that in your item.cfg when you are supposed to leave a gap between each set of numbers (Ex. item = 8002 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 140 140 140 41) That you don't put spaces. Make sure you press tab |<- ->| Key

item.title: [317] Run.bat
item.dc:creator: @triger545 triger545
item.description:
@triger545 wrote:

I recently added d claws to my server and now when i run it it says this:

online
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16
at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283)
at ItemHandler.(ItemHandler.java:173)
at server.main(server.java:113)

I compiled it and it said no errors.

Any Idea Why?

---------------------------------------FIXED----------------------------------------

Solution:

Make sure that in your item.cfg when you are supposed to leave a gap between each set of numbers (Ex. item = 8002 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 140 140 140 41)
That you don’t put spaces. Make sure you press tab
|<-
->|
Key
